channel.title: Hello guys this is the original maker of epicscape! here with another release!
channel.description:
hey guys! this is collin aka : Dark! today i am releasing my epicscape v2 called dark avengers :cool: :P :rolleyes: :) :D ;D tons of customs lots of dupes have been patched custom items custom npcs this is a project insanity! :eek: if you guys ever had my epicscape files and loved it well you will love this even more we got pikachus and spongebob!
things that need fixing that i dont got time to do anymore things that arent finished things that are almost finished a new home ::shops has most shops but not all are there yet! i do not care if u repost just give me credits! download https://mega.co.nz/#!C4QBXa5Q!IQ-dsLtlAjUDuq-qTryeUbTLs03HrSjCsM0dvDJpkqA <-------- client and source are in it! cache auto downloads! i dont have pictures this file has been in my mega for a long time! sorry! but it has no viruses if it does pm me and i will give u my ip and u can ddos me! but u will need proof that it does! credits project insanity for base me for the items and npcs and most of the shops! payton for his support!!!!!!! i no longer need this file i am owner of a 667 rsps! if u want u can join! * loads of customs with custom bosses! were adding quests too! dont reply if your gonna hate mk! thanks! bc i will remove with the first hatred!
